info.title: Programme.lv backend
info.description: Service for managing users, tasks, and submissions.

get.description: Stream updates to all submissions in real-time
Get a task by its ID

Get a user by UUID

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `users:read`

delete.description:
Delete a user

**Required security scopes for jwt**:
  * `users:write`
